name: CLOCKBOUND EP over n' over Demo: The Record Store Incident
name_original: CLOCKBOUND EP over n' over Demo: The Record Store Incident
description:
This is an early prototype.

This protoype features zero art, audio, narrative or dialog from the final product.

CONTROLS
  • WASD / Arrow Keys
    • Move
  • Z / Return
    • Confirm
  • X / Escape / Space
    • Cancel / Pause

Controllers are not officially supported in a capacity beyond default RPG Maker MV implementation for this prototype build. The same goes for mobile devices such as phones or tablets.

OBJECTIVE
  • Collect all four CDs.
  • You have 15 minutes.
